summary: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.
cast: Richard Harris|Charlotte Rampling|Will Sampson|Bo Derek|Keenan Wynn|Robert Carradine|Scott Walker|Peter Hooten|Wayne Heffley|Vincent Gentile|Don 'Red' Barry|Don Leslie|Nepo|Yaka
title: Orca: La ballena asesina
